summary: This document contains technical corrections to a notice of proposed rulemaking (REG-112261-24) that was published in the Federal Register on Thursday, January 16, 2025. REG-112261-24 contains proposed regulations regarding certain matters relating to corporate separations, incorporations, and reorganizations qualifying, in whole or in part, for nonrecognition of gain or loss.
title: Guidance Regarding Certain Matters Relating to Nonrecognition of Gain or Loss in Corporate Separations, Incorporations, and Reorganizations; Technical Correction
